items.content_html: A secure and lightweight backend microservice built using **Node.js**, **Express.js**, **SQLite**, and **Multer**. This project enables secure file uploads, user authentication with **JWT**, and basic job processing simulation for uploaded files.

items.content_html: Part 2 of my PP5 project for my full stack software diploma (advanced frontend). This is the back end component to the application built with drf, simple jwt and cors that hosts the api to guild meet my scalable lightweight discord clone, for people who want to meet and make friends with others of like minded interests

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.

items.content_html: TabStateSync is a lightweight TypeScript library for synchronizing state across multiple browser tabs. It uses the BroadcastChannel API (with localStorage fallback) to keep data and events in sync between tabs, with no backend or external dependencies required.
items.title: robertluiz/TabStateSync: TabStateSync is a lightweight TypeScript library for synchronizing state across multiple browser tabs. It uses the BroadcastChannel API (with localStorage fallback) to keep data and events in sync between tabs, with no backend or external dependencies required.
